summary: Brian, painter Ellen and chef Sam timeshare an apartment on different days. A shift on Mon/Wednesdays causes mistaken identity as Ellen and Sam have never met but leave notes, food etc. behind for each other.
cast: Matthew Broderick|Annabella Sciorra|Tim Guinee|Michelle Hurst|Dana Wheeler-Nicholson|Brooke Smith|Mary B. McCann|Naomi Campbell|Michael Mastro|Katharine Houghton|Mary Fulham|Kathryn Rossetter|Steven Goldstein|Catherine Lloyd Burns|Bitty Schram|Billy Campbell|Suzanne Lanza|Michael Mantell|Christine Baranski|Ranjit Chowdhry|Richard Poe|Paul Guilfoyle|Lewis Black|Michael Imperioli|Suzanne Dottino|José Evelio Álvarez|Davidson Thomson|Kevin Anderson|Justine Bateman|Greg Germann|Bradley White|Paul J.Q. Lee|Louise Lasser|Geoffrey Grider|Billy Strong|David Slavin|Doris Roberts|Dominic Chianese|George Gerard|Marianne Hettinger|Kurt Leitner|Felissa Rose|Garry Shandling|Jeanne Tripplehorn
title: La noche que nunca tuvimos
